string-array.name: description
string-array.item: Space: the final frontier... these are the voyages of... a walrus?Meet Walter. He is the first walrus in a revolutionary space program. Someday, his blubbery form will float past asteroids, stars, and planets as he journeys through the dark beyond to become a Master of Space.
Dungeons, Dragons is a fantasy tabletop role-playing game originally designed by Gary Gygax and Dave Arneson.

It is the mission control area of a racing team which makes all the tactical and strategic calls on the race track during a grand prix. A Formula 1 pit wall typically is a gantry box where the operation of running a race car, during a race event, is done.
